alert.note: Alert for Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 12:11PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Showers with strong wind gusts will affect western Steuben County through 115 PM EDT... At 1208 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers along a line extending from near Dansville to Ole Bull State Park. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. Wind gusts associated with this line of showers have exceeded 50 mph at times over Allegany County in New York. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hornell, Bath, Canisteo, Wayland, Woodhull, Howard, Jasper, Troupsburg, Wheeler and Avoca. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
